application.core.config

Class JPAConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.core.config.JPAConfig

  • @Configuration
 @EnableJpaRepositories(value="application.core.repository")
 @EnableTransactionManagement
 @EnableCaching
public class JPAConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Handling main configuration for JPa
